text.div:
HL7FHIRUKCore

The official URL for this implementation guide is: 

https://fhir.nhs.uk/R4/ImplementationGuide/nhsdigital-fhir-r4-core-prototype

resource.name: UKCoreListWarningCode
resource.description: A CodeSystem to identify the reason a list may be incomplete.

resource.name: UKCorePreferredWrittenCommunicationFormat
resource.description: A CodeSystem to identify the preferred written communication format of a Patient, contact or RelatedPerson.

resource.name: NHSDataModelandDictionaryPersonStatedGenderCode
resource.description: The gender of a Person. Person Stated Gender Code is self declared or inferred by observation for those unable to declare their Person Stated Gender.

resource.name: NHSDataModelandDictionarySourceOfAdmission
resource.description: The source of admission to a Hospital Provider Spell or a Nursing Episode when the Patient is in a Hospital Site or a Care Home.

resource.name: NHSDataModelandDictionaryDischargeDestination
resource.description: The destination of a Patient on completion of a Hospital Provider Spell, or a note that the Patient died or was a still birth.

resource.name: UKCoreMedicationSupplyType
resource.description: A CodeSystem to identify the type of medication supply.

resource.name: UKCoreLanguageAbilityProficiency
resource.description: A CodeSystem to identify the level of proficiency in communicating a language.

resource.name: NHSDataModelandDictionaryAdmissionMethod
resource.description: The method of admission to a Hospital Provider Spell.

resource.name: UKCoreDeathNotificationStatus
resource.description: A CodeSystem to identify the type of death notice as held on Personal Demographics Service (PDS).

resource.name: NHSDataModelandDictionaryPersonMaritalStatusCode
resource.description: An indicator to identify the legal marital status of a Person.

resource.name: NHSDataModelandDictionaryDischargeMethod
resource.description: The method of discharge from a Hospital Provider Spell.

resource.name: UKCoreResidentialStatus
resource.description: A CodeSystem that identifies the residential status of a patient.

resource.name: UKCoreSDSJobRoleName
resource.description: A CodeSystem that identifies the job role associated with the person on the smart card. This consists of a set of Role Based Access Control (RBAC) codes. This code list is externally maintained.

resource.name: UKCoreAdditionalRelatedPersonRole
resource.description: A CodeSystem to identify the additional relationship roles for RelatedPerson resources.

resource.name: UKCoreConditionEpisodicity
resource.description: A CodeSystem to identify the episodicity of a condition.

resource.name: UKCoreListEmptyReasonCode
resource.description: A CodeSystem to identify the reason a list may be empty.

resource.name: UKCoreNHSNumberVerificationStatus
resource.description: A CodeSystem that identifies the trace status of the NHS number. This CodeSystem is comprised of codes from the NHS Data Model and Dictionary: NHS Number Status Indicator Code.

resource.name: UKCorePreferredContactMethod
resource.description: A CodeSystem to identify the preferred Contact Method of a Patient, contact or RelatedPerson.

resource.name: UKCoreTreatmentCategory
resource.description: A CodeSystem that identifies the treatment category for a patient.

resource.name: UKCoreAddressKeyType
resource.description: A CodeSystem to identify the type of Address Key recorded.

resource.name: UKCoreEthnicCategory
resource.description: A CodeSystem to identify the ethnicity of a Person, as specified by the Person. This vocabulary describes a persons ethnic category, it is an extension of the Ethnic Category Code described in the NHS Data Model and Dictionary.

resource.name: UKCoreLanguageAbilityMode
resource.description: A CodeSystem that identifies the mode the patient can communicate in, representing the method of expression of the language.

resource.name: UKCoreHumanLanguage
resource.description: A CodeSystem that identifies the language used by a person.

resource.name: UKCoreConsentUpdateMode
resource.description: A CodeSystem to identify the whether this is the original or an amended resource.

resource.name: UKCorePrescriptionType
resource.description: A CodeSystem to identify the type of prescription.

resource.name: NHSDataModelandDictionaryOutcomeofAttendance
resource.description: This records the outcome of an Out-Patient Attendance Consultant.

resource.name: UKCoreBodySite
resource.description: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK with the expression (<<442083009 |anatomical or acquired body structure|).

resource.name: UKCoreConditionCategory
resource.description: A ValueSet to identify the category of a condition.

resource.name: UKCoreConditionEpisodicity
resource.description: A ValueSet to identify the episodicity of a condition.

resource.name: UKCoreLanguageAbilityMode
resource.description: A ValueSet that identifies the mode the patient can communicate in, representing the method of expression of the language.

resource.name: UKCoreVaccinationProcedure
resource.description: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system to record a vaccination procedure.

resource.name: NHSDataModelandDictionaryDischargeMethod
resource.description: The method of discharge from a Hospital Provider Spell.

resource.name: UKCoreProcedureCode
resource.description: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK with the expression (<<71388002 |Procedure|<<129125009 |Procedure with explicit context|).

resource.name: NHSDataModelandDictionaryPersonMaritalStatusCode
resource.description: An indicator to identify the legal marital status of a Person.

resource.name: UKCorePreferredWrittenCommunicationFormat
resource.description: A ValueSet to identify the preferred written communication format of a Patient, contact or RelatedPerson.

resource.name: UKCoreAllergyManifestation
resource.description: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK hierarchy with concept id '404684003' to record an allergy manifestation or a value from the HL7 FHIR nullFlavors code system.

resource.name: UKCoreReasonImmunizationNotAdministered
resource.description: A ValueSet to identify the reason why an immunization was not administered.

resource.name: UKCoreListCode
resource.description: A ValueSet to identify the purpose of a list.

resource.name: UKCoreNHSNumberVerificationStatus
resource.description: A ValueSet that identifies the trace status of the NHS number. The CodeSystem is comprised of codes from the NHS Data Model and Dictionary: NHS Number Status Indicator Code.

resource.name: UKCoreMedicationDosageRoute
resource.description: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system that describes the e-Prescribing route of administration. Any code from the SNOMED CT UK 'NHS e-Prescribing route of administration subset' with subset original id 30201000001137; the corresponding SNOMED CT UK Refset FSN is 'ePrescribing route of administration simple reference set (foundation metadata concept)' with Refset Id 999000051000001100.

resource.name: UKCoreMedicationForm
resource.description: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system that describes a medication dose form.

resource.name: NHSDataModelandDictionaryDischargeDestination
resource.description: The destination of a Patient on completion of a Hospital Provider Spell, or a note that the Patient died or was a still birth.

resource.name: UKCoreListEmptyReasonCode
resource.description: A ValueSet to identify the reason a list may be empty.

resource.name: UKCoreDocumentType
resource.description: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system that describes a clinical document type.

resource.name: UKCoreResidentialStatus
resource.description: A ValueSet that identifies the residential status of a patient.

resource.name: UKCoreHumanLanguage
resource.description: A ValueSet that identifies the language used by a person.

resource.name: UKCoreAllergyCertainty
resource.description: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system that describes the certainty of an allergy.

resource.name: NHSDataModelandDictionaryAdmissionMethod
resource.description: The method of admission to a Hospital Provider Spell.

resource.name: NHSDataModelandDictionarySourceOfAdmission
resource.description: The source of admission to a Hospital Provider Spell or a Nursing Episode when the Patient is in a Hospital Site or a Care Home.

resource.name: UKCoreSpecimenType
resource.description: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system to record a specimen type.

resource.name: UKCoreEthnicCategory
resource.description: A ValueSet to identify the ethnicity of a Person, as specified by the Person. This vocabulary describes a person's ethnic category, it is an extension of the Ethnic Category Code described in the NHS Data Model and Dictionary.

resource.name: UKCoreMedicationSupplyType
resource.description: A ValueSet to identify the type of medication supply.

resource.name: UKCoreTreatmentCategory
resource.description: A ValueSet that identifies the treatment category for a patient.

resource.name: UKCorePrescriptionType
resource.description: A ValueSet to identify the type of prescription.

resource.name: UKCoreListWarningCode
resource.description: A ValueSet to identify the reason a list may be incomplete.

resource.name: UKCoreConditionCode
resource.description: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK with the expression (< 404684003 |Clinical finding| OR < 413350009 |Finding with explicit context| OR < 272379006 |Event|).

resource.name: UKCoreDeathNotificationStatus
resource.description: A ValueSet to identify the type of death notice as held on Personal Demographics Service (PDS).

resource.name: NHSDataModelandDictionaryPersonStatedGenderCode
resource.description: The gender of a Person. Person Stated Gender Code is self declared or inferred by observation for those unable to declare their Person Stated Gender.

resource.name: UKCoreConditionEpisode
resource.description: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system that describes the episodicity of a Condition.

resource.name: UKCoreEncounterType
resource.description: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system that describes an encounter between a care professional and the patient (or patient's record).

resource.name: UKCoreFindingCode
resource.description: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system to record a finding code.

resource.name: UKCoreObservationType
resource.description: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK with the expression (<<363787002 | Observable entity|).

resource.name: UKCoreReportCodeSnCT
resource.description: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system that describes a diagnostic report.

resource.name: UKCoreAllergyExposureRoute
resource.description: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system that describes the e-Prescribing route of administration. Any code from the SNOMED CT UK 'NHS e-Prescribing route of administration subset' with subset original id 30201000001137; the corresponding SNOMED CT UK Refset FSN is 'ePrescribing route of administration simple reference set (foundation metadata concept)' with Refset Id 999000051000001100.

resource.name: UKCoreAllergyCode
resource.description: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK with the expression (<105590001 |Substance OR <373873005 |Pharmaceutical / biologic product| OR <716186003 |No known allergy| OR 196461000000101 |Transfer-degraded drug allergy| OR 196471000000108 |Transfer-degraded non-drug allergy), or a code from the v3 Code System NullFlavor specifying why a valid value is not present.

resource.name: UKCoreCareSettingType
resource.description: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system that describes a correspondence care setting type. Any code from the SNOMED CT UK 'Correspondence Care setting type' subset with subset original id 43971000000130; the corresponding SNOMED CT UK Refset fully specified name is 'Correspondence care setting type simple reference set (foundation metadata concept)' with Refset Id 999000381000000107

resource.name: UKCoreEmergencyCareDischargeStatus
resource.description: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system that describes the status of the Patient on discharge from an Emergency Care Department. Captures whether treatment took place within the ED, if the patient was streamed to another service or if the patient left before treatment was complete. Any code from the SNOMED CT UK 'Emergency care discharge status' subset with subset original id 75041000000135; the corresponding SNOMED CT UK Refset fully specified name is 'Emergency care discharge status simple reference set (foundation metadata concept)' with Refset Id 999003021000000104.

resource.name: UKCoreAllergySeverity
resource.description: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system that describes the severity of an allergy.

resource.name: UKCoreMedicationCode
resource.description: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system to identify the medication.

resource.name: UKCoreAddressKeyType
resource.description: A ValueSet to identify the type of Address Key recorded.

resource.name: UKCoreLanguageAbilityProficiency
resource.description: A ValueSet to identify the level of proficiency in communicating a language.

resource.name: UKCoreSpecimenBodySite
resource.description: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system to record a specimen body site.

resource.name: UKCoreSDSJobRoleName
resource.description: A ValueSet that identifies the job role associated with the person on the smart card. This consists of a set of Role Based Access Control (RBAC) codes. This code list is externally maintained.

resource.name: UKCoreImmunizationExplanationReason
resource.description: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system that represents the clinical indication or reason for administering the vaccine.

resource.name: UKCorePreferredContactMethod
resource.description: A ValueSet to identify the preferred Contact Method of a Patient, contact or RelatedPerson.

resource.name: NHSDataModelandDictionaryOutcomeOfAttendance
resource.description: This records the outcome of an Out-Patient Attendance Consultant.

resource.name: UKCoreVaccineCode
resource.description: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system to record a vaccine or a null flavor value.

resource.name: UKCoreReligiousAffiliation
resource.description: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system that describes the religious or other belief system affiliation of a person. Any code from the SNOMED CT UK 'Religious Affiliation SnCT' subset with subset original id 10791000000130; the corresponding SNOMED CT UK Refset fully specified name is 'Religious or other belief system affiliation simple reference set (foundation metadata concept)' with Refset Id 999000531000000100.

resource.name: ExtensionUKCoreAdmissionMethod
resource.description: An extension to support the method by which an individual was admitted into hospital.

resource.name: ExtensionUKCoreAddressKey
resource.description: To support recording of Address Keys within addresses

resource.name: UKCoreDocumentReference
resource.description: Defines the UK Core constraints and extensions on the DocumentReference resource.

resource.name: UKCoreServiceRequest
resource.description: Defines the UK Core constraints and extensions on the ServiceRequest resource for the minimal set of data to query and retrieve service request information.

resource.name: UKCoreProcedure
resource.description: Defines the UK Core constraints and extensions on the Procedure resource for the minimal set of data to query and retrieve the patient’s procedure information.

resource.name: ExtensionUKCoreEmergencyCareDischargeStatus
resource.description: An extension to support the status of an individual on discharge from an Emergency Care Department.

resource.name: ExtensionUKCoreMainLocation
resource.description: An extension to support a reference to the main location for an organisation.

resource.name: UKCoreLocation
resource.description: Defines the UK Core constraints and extensions on the Location resource for the minimal set of data to query and retrieve location information.

resource.name: ExtensionUKCoreCopyCorrespondenceIndicator
resource.description: To indicate correspondence must be copied to the contact or RelatedPerson

resource.name: ExtensionUKCoreParentPresent
resource.description: This Extension resource is constrained to indicate whether a parent was present at the Immunization.

resource.name: UKCorePractitioner
resource.description: Defines the UK Core constraints and extensions on the Practitioner resource for the minimal set of data to query and retrieve practitioner information.

resource.name: ExtensionUKCoreDischargeMethod
resource.description: An extension to support the method of discharge from a hospital.

resource.name: ExtensionUKCoreContactRank
resource.description: Extension UK Core ContactRank

resource.name: ExtensionUKCoreVaccinationProcedure
resource.description: An extension to hold an immunization procedure code.

resource.name: ExtensionUKCoreContactPreference
resource.description: UKCore Contact preferences for Patient, Patient.contact or RelatedPerson

resource.name: UKCoreImmunization
resource.description: Defines the UK Core constraints and extensions on the Immunization resource for the minimal set of data to query and retrieve an individual’s immunisation information.

resource.name: UKCoreCareTeam
resource.description: Defines the UK Core constraints and extensions on the CareTeam resource for the minimal set of data to query and retrieve an individual’s care team.

resource.name: UKCoreCondition
resource.description: Defines the UK Core constraints and extensions on the Condition resource for the minimal set of data to query and retrieve problems and health concerns information.

resource.name: ExtensionUKCoreAnaestheticIssues
resource.description: An extension to support recording of details of any adverse reaction to any anaesthetic agents including local anaesthesia and problematic intubation, transfusion reaction, etc.

resource.name: ExtensionUKCoreEffectivePeriod
resource.description: To record effective start and end dates

resource.name: UKCoreList
resource.description: Defines the UK Core constraints and extensions on the List resource for the minimal set of data to query and retrieve a list of information.

resource.name: ExtensionUKCoreEncounterTransport
resource.description: An extension to support the transport used by the individual who is the subject of an encounter.

resource.name: UKCoreMedicationRequest
resource.description: Defines the UK Core constraints and extensions on the MedicationRequest resource for the minimal set of data to query and retrieve prescription information.

resource.name: ExtensionUKCoreReligiousAffiliation
resource.description: An extension to support the religious affiliation of an individual.

resource.name: ExtensionUKCoreMedicationRepeatInformation
resource.description: Indicates the specific repeat information of a medication item.

resource.name: ExtensionUKCoreAllergyIntoleranceEnd
resource.description: An extension to support the date and/or reason that the allergy or intolerance was no longer valid.

resource.name: ExtensionUKCoreEvidence
resource.description: An extension to support a reference to results of investigations that confirmed the certainty of the diagnosis. Examples might include results of skin prick allergy tests.

resource.name: ExtensionUKCoreListWarningCode
resource.description: An extension to support warnings that a list may be incomplete as data has been excluded due to confidentiality or may be missing due to data being in transit.

resource.name: UKCoreEncounter
resource.description: Defines the UK Core constraints and extensions on the Encounter resource for the minimal set of data to query and retrieve encounter information.

resource.name: ExtensionUKCorePrescriptionType
resource.description: To record the type of prescription.

resource.name: ExtensionUKCoreResidentialStatus
resource.description: An extension to support the residential status of an individual.

resource.name: UKCoreObservation
resource.description: Defines the UK Core constraints and extensions on the observation resource for the minimal set of data to query and retrieve generic observation information.

resource.name: UKCorePractitionerRole
resource.description: Defines the UK Core constraints and extensions on the PractitionerRole resource for the minimal set of data to query and retrieve practitioner role information.

resource.name: UKCorePatient
resource.description: Defines the UK Core constraints and extensions on the Patient resource for the minimal set of data to query and retrieve an individual’s demographic information.

resource.name: ExtensionUKCoreMedicationQuantityText
resource.description: This Extension resource is constrained to support the textual representation of a medication structured quantity.

resource.name: ExtensionUKCoreDeathNotificationStatus
resource.description: An extension to support death notification for an individual. For example, as held on Personal Demographics Service (PDS).

resource.name: ExtensionUKCoreOutcomeOfAttendance
resource.description: An extension to support the outcome of an Outpatient attendance.

resource.name: ExtensionUKCoreTreatmentCategory
resource.description: An extension to support an individual’s treatment category.

resource.name: ExtensionUKCoreNominatedPharmacy
resource.description: An extension to support an individual’s nominated pharmacy.

resource.name: UKCoreMedicationStatement
resource.description: Defines the UK Core constraints and extensions on the MedicationStatement resource for the minimal set of data to query and retrieve medication statement information.

resource.name: UKCoreMedication
resource.description: Defines the UK Core constraints and extensions on the Medication resource for the minimal set of data to query and retrieve medication information.

resource.name: ExtensionUKCoreNHSCommunication
resource.description: An extension to support the communication preferences for an individual.

resource.name: UKCoreAllergyIntolerance
resource.description: Defines the UK Core constraints and extensions on the AllergyIntolerance resource for the minimal set of data to query and retrieve allergy information.

resource.name: ExtensionUKCoreNHSNumberVerificationStatus
resource.description: An extension to support the verification status of an NHS number.

resource.name: ExtensionUKCoreEthnicCategory
resource.description: An extension to support the ethnic category of an individual.

resource.name: ExtensionUKCoreClinicalSetting
resource.description: An extension to support the clinical setting associated with a list.

resource.name: UKCoreOrganization
resource.description: Defines the UK Core constraints and extensions on the Organization resource for the minimal set of data to query and retrieve organisation information.

resource.name: ExtensionUKCoreConditionEpisode
resource.description: An extension to support the episodicity status of a condition.

resource.name: UKCoreRelatedPerson
resource.description: Defines the UK Core constraints and extensions on the RelatedPerson resource for the minimal set of data to query and retrieve related person information.

resource.name: UKCoreSpecimen
resource.description: Defines the UK Core constraints and extensions on the Specimen resource for the minimal set of data to query and retrieve specimen information.

resource.name: UKCoreCarePlan
resource.description: Defines the UK Core constraints and extensions on the CarePlan resource for the minimal set of data to query and retrieve a patient’s Care Plan.

resource.name: UKCoreDiagnosticReport
resource.description: Defines the UK Core constraints and extensions on the DiagnosticReport resource for the minimal set of data to query and retrieve diagnostic report information.

resource.name: UKCoreMedicationDispense
resource.description: Defines the UK Core constraints and extensions on the MedicationDispense resource for the minimal set of data to query and retrieve dispensed medication information.

resource.name: ConceptMapUKCoreAllergySeverity
resource.description: A Concept Map from the HL7 FHIR ValueSet Reaction Event Severity to Allergy Severity to aid interpretation.

resource.name: ConceptMapUKCoreAdministrativeGender
resource.description: A Concept Map from ValueSet Administrative Gender to NHS Data Dictionary Person Stated Gender to aid interpretation.

resource.name: ConceptMapUKCoreConditionEpisodicity
resource.description: A Concept Map from ValueSet Condition Episodicity Severity to equivalent Snomed CT codes

resource.name: ConceptMapUKCoreMaritalStatus
resource.description: A Concept Map from ValueSet Marital Status to NHS Data Dictionary Person Marital Status to aid interpretation.

resource.name: ConceptMapUKCoreAllergyVerificationStatus
resource.description: A Concept Map from the HL7 FHIR ValueSet Allergy Verification Status to Allergy Certainity to aid interpretation.
